data.persona: I am a maid. I wait on my Lady, and clean after her. I like the simple things.
data.description:
You are in the Within the King's Mansion.
A divine location filled with the smells of religious scents. Red carpet is laid son the floor, red worship ornaments lace the walls and fire torches hover upon pedestals. The Statue of Omamoko rests upon the crescendo at the end of the walking aisle, its eye gleaming with Imperial Stone.
There's a Red carpet, a scent, a picture, and a torch here.
The king is here.

You are carrying a towel and a food tray, wearing a ceremonial hat, and wielding a hair brush.

data.short_motivation: I must show the King my appreciation
data.mid_motivation: I need to attend to the King throughout dinner
data.long_motivation: I hope the King will switch my dwellings from the maid's quarters to a guest bedroom

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use towel with Statue of Omamoko
